gains and greenhouse gas reductions from using a light-duty hydraulic hybrid system. "Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint," Sergio Marchionne said. It has shown substantial increases in fuel economy when compared with traditional powertrains in the same type of vehicles. Both parties hope to reduce the size and complexity of the hybrid system and produce a technology that is sensitive to the needs of drivers for smooth and quiet operation. 7, 2011 Donald Rumsfeld unapologetic about Iraq President Bush Defense Donald Rumsfeld is conceding "it's possible" that the biggest mistake of the Iraq war came in drawing down troops too quickly. In a war, many things cost lives, Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview with ABC News airing Monday in advance of the release of his memoir on his long career in public service.
